public class  CmdAdjustGrid
     extends uci.gef.Cmd
{
          // Constructors 1
     public CmdAdjustGrid();

          // Methods 2
     public void doIt();
     public void undoIt();
}

An Cmd to modify the way that the grid layer of the current document looks. For now it just cycles among a few predefined looks. Needs-More-Work: should put up a grid preference dialog box or use property sheet.
